return {{GetAllProducts.data}}.map(row => {
  var newRow = {}
  newRow["id"] = row.id
  newRow["이름"] = row.name
  newRow["가격"] = row.price
  newRow["상세설명"] = row.description
  newRow["상세페이지"] = row.id
  newRow["썸네일"] = row.thumbnail
  newRow["컬리 페이지"] = row.link
  return newRow
})
